TJanuaStringBuilder Methods

Methods
 NameDescription
Add(string)

Compatible with Original IStringBuilder function

Append(Boolean)

Overloaded. Compatible with Original TStringBuilder function

Append(Byte)

Overloaded. Represents method Append(Byte).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(Cardinal).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(Char).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(Char,Integer).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(Currency).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(PAnsiChar).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(RawByteString).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(Shortint).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(Smallint).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(string,Integer,Integer).

Overloaded. Represents method Append(TCharArray).

Append(Word)

Overloaded. Represents method Append(Word).

AppendLine(string)

Appends a new line to the builder

AppendSQL(string)

uses XSF_SqlAdd before adding a string to the Builder

AppendVars(string,variant[])

Appends an array of Variants converted to SQL Strings uses format Pascal function

Clear

Clears all the content of the builder

Text

Outputs content as a string with Line-Separators syntax compatible with TStrings

ToString

Outputs content as a string with Line-Separators
